plot outline: Jai (Varun Sandesh) meets a girl Mahalakshmi (Haripriya) in a train and falls in love with her in course of the journey. He accidentally attends a ceremony which turns out to be Mahalakshmi's engagement and is left heartbroken. But to his surprise, Mahalakshmi elopes with the groom whom she was engaged to. How Jai wins Mahalakshmi's heart by overcoming odd situations makes the rest of the story.
title: Ee varsham sakshiga
